bill_title: increase the maximum property tax levy for the pension fund of a school district.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the maximum property tax levy for the pension fund of a school district. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-10-6 be amended to read as follows: 13-10-6. For the purpose of continuing a fund for the payment of pensions to retired employees of school districts which shall have established such system, such districts may levy an annual tax not exceeding thirty thirty-six cents per thousand dollars of taxable valuation of such school district for the current year. Such levy may not be included in determining the tax levy limitation of such district provided by law. Moneys collected from such tax shall be kept by the business manager in a special pension fund and shall not be used for any other purpose except upon discontinuance of such pension system by the district, in which case any unexpended balance shall be transferred to the general fund. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
